block.p: O'NEILL-Catherine (nee Early) of Riverdale, N.Y. (native of County Tyrone, Ireland) on August 19, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Daniel O'Niell. Loving mother of Mary Margaret Henshaw, Daniel O'Neill, and Kathleen Flynn. Devoted grandmother (Mamie) of Raymond, Daniel, Christopher, Kerry Marie, Paul, Elizabeth, William, Thomas, Catherine, Brian, John Patrick, Peter, Brian Paul, Margaret, Christine, Kerry and Mary Beth. Cherished greatgrandmother of Bridget, Conor, Daniel, Paul C., Kevin, Paul, Megan, Matthew, Miles, Christine, John and Christopher. Dear sister of Marian Toal and Rose McMahon. Relatives and friends may visit at Riverdale-on-Hudson Funeral Home, 6110 Riverdale Avenue, Riverdale, N.Y. on Tuesday from 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial Wednesday 10 AM at St. Margaret of Cortona Church, Riverdale, N.Y. Burial at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Valhalla, N.Y.
